decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to generate a fast and aggressive start by utilizing low-cost creatures and mana acceleration. By utilizing cards such as Solitude and Chrome Mox, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Archon of Emeria and Anointed Peacekeeper. The inclusion of cards like Chalice of the Void helps to control the board while maintaining pressure. With a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to secure an early advantage and maintain momentum throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to disrupt your opponent with disruptive creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Flickerwisp while also applying pressure with efficient beaters like Samwise the Stouthearted and Stoneforge Mystic. The deck also aims to control the board with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Wasteland. The deck utilizes Aether Vial to cheat out creatures and provides utility with cards like Mother of Runes and Mishra's Bauble. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure and controlling the board to secure victory.

The deck focuses on using land destruction and denial to control the opponent's resources while setting up powerful land-based win conditions like Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage. The main strategy is to slow down the opponent with cards like Sphere of Resistance and Wasteland, while generating value through cards like Life from the Loam and Urza's Saga. By efficiently utilizing lands and land-based abilities, the deck aims to grind out a victory through attrition and denial of opponent's key resources.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts and card advantage to quickly overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By leveraging cards like Painter's Servant and Grindstone, the deck can potentially mill an opponent's entire library in just a few turns. Emry, Lurker of the Loch provides additional value by recurring artifacts from the graveyard, while Urza's Saga and Karn, the Great Creator offer powerful tutor effects to find key pieces. With a mix of fast mana and counterspells like Metallic Rebuke and Force of Will, the deck aims to control the battlefield and win through efficient combat or alternate win conditions.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly cast spells with Cascade to put pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their game plan with countermagic. Using creatures like Shardless Agent and Brazen Borrower, along with spells like Violent Outburst and Crashing Footfalls, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with threats. The inclusion of cards like Lórien Revealed and Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes provide additional utility and versatility to deal with various situations. The use of land destruction with Wasteland also helps control the opponent's resources.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of control elements, card advantage, and efficient removal spells to control the game and outvalue the opponent. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Force of Will and removal spells like Swords to Plowshares, while generating value through cards like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Brainstorm. The deck also has ways to recur important cards with Life from the Loam and offers versatility with cards like Dress Down and Triumph of Saint Katherine. The mana base is built to support the deck's multicolor requirements efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using efficient burn spells and low-cost creatures. By utilizing cards like Goblin Guide, Monastery Swiftspear, and Eidolon of the Great Revel, along with a suite of burn spells like Lightning Bolt, Price of Progress, and Fireblast, this deck aims to finish off the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Roiling Vortex helps to further push damage through and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

The deck is focused on playing aggressive Goblin creatures quickly and overwhelming the opponent with fast and powerful attacks. It includes mana acceleration cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide to cast impactful cards early. The goblins work well together with cards like Muxus, Goblin Grandee and Goblin Ringleader to generate card advantage and keep up the pressure. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive cards like Chalice of the Void to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck's mana base consists of efficient lands like Ancient Tomb and City of Traitors to support its aggressive game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively disrupt the opponent's game plan by utilizing cards like Opposition Agent, Grief, and Thoughtseize to strip away their key cards. The deck then aims to quickly close out the game with aggressive creatures like Stalactite Stalker and Orcish Bowmasters, while also having the ability to reanimate powerful threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Snuff Out to deal with opposing threats. Overall, this deck seeks to overwhelm and outpace the opponent with a combination of disruption and aggression.
